name: Hello, micro.blog friends! I needed to update microgram and micromemories for technical reasons (moving from Python 3.6 to Python 3.9 runtimes on AWS Lambda because of deprecation). Let me know if you have issues!

summary:
@pratik people will need to check their sites. I made the changes after some level of testing, but there are a lot of sites using the plugin and I can't check them all 😃
If you (or anyone else!) sees an issue, definitely let me know, and I'll do my best to resolve them quickly.
